keyMappings:
unmapAll

map j scrollDown
map k scrollUp
map gg scrollToTop
map G scrollToBottom
map d scrollPageDown
map u scrollPageUp
map h scrollLeft
map l scrollRight

#focusing
map gi focusInput
map f LinkHints.activateMode
map <a-f> LinkHints.activateModeWithQueue
map yf  LinkHints.activateModeToCopyLinkUrl
map <c-e> mainFrame

#tabs
map J previousTab
map K nextTab
map << moveTabLeft
map >> moveTabRight

map ? showHelp
